title: Praying Scripture Over Your Child's Life
itunes:author: Guest: Jodie Berndt
itunes:summary:
You try to be a godly parent. Yet, when the demands of raising your kids leave you feeling exhausted, finding time to pray and read Scripture can be hard. John and Danny offer a helpful tool that will benefit your home environment. Featuring Jodie Berndt.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive Jodie Berndt's book "Praying the Scriptures for your Children" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-05-17?refcd=1410904

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/praying-scripture-over-your-childs-life/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/praying-scripture-over-your-child-s-life-digital/?refcd=1410904

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
